articles.title: NVIDIA Unveils New Open Models, Data and Tools to Advance AI Across Every Industry
articles.description: Expanding the open model universe, NVIDIA today released new open models, data and tools to advance AI across every industry. These models — spanning the NVIDIA Nemotron family for agentic AI, the NVIDIA Cosmos platform for physical AI, the new NVIDIA Alpamayo family for autonomous vehicle development, NVIDIA Isaac GR00T for robotics and NVIDIA Clara Read Article

articles.title: Recursive Language Models (RLMs): From MIT’s Blueprint to Prime Intellect’s RLMEnv for Long Horizon LLM Agents
articles.description: Recursive Language Models aim to break the usual trade off between context length, accuracy and cost in large language models. Instead of forcing a model to read a giant prompt in one pass, RLMs treat the prompt as an external environment and let the model decide how to inspect it with code, then recursively call […] The post Recursive Language Models (RLMs): From MIT’s Blueprint to Prime Intellect’s RLMEnv for Long Horizon LLM Agents appeared first on MarkTechPost.

articles.content: Recursive Language Models aim to break the usual trade off between context length, accuracy and cost in large language models. articles.title: JBL expands Tune Series with long-lasting ANC headphones at CES 2026
articles.description: At CES 2026 in Las Vegas on January 5, 2026, JBL announced expansions to its Tune Series headphones, introducing models with enhanced sound, upgraded performance, and new designs to match everyday listening requirements. The new collection includes the JBL Tune 780NC over-ear headphones and JBL Tune 680NC on-ear headphones, which bring Adaptive Noise Cancelling and […]

articles.title: CES 2026: New Galaxy features aim to spot dementia symptoms early
articles.description: Samsung announced at its CES 2026 First Look event that Galaxy wearables will detect early signs of dementia through tracking changes in speech, movement, and daily activity, aiming to provide early warnings for users and families to seek medical care, with beta rollout in select markets. The company concluded its First Look event at CES […]

articles.title: Tencent Researchers Release Tencent HY-MT1.5: A New Translation Models Featuring 1.8B and 7B Models Designed for Seamless on-Device and Cloud Deployment
articles.description: Tencent Hunyuan researchers have released HY-MT1.5, a multilingual machine translation family that targets both mobile devices and cloud systems with the same training recipe and metrics. HY-MT1.5 consists of 2 translation models, HY-MT1.5-1.8B and HY-MT1.5-7B, supports mutual translation across 33 languages with 5 ethnic and dialect variations, and is available on GitHub and Hugging Face […] The post Tencent Researchers Release Tencent HY-MT1.5: A New Translation Models Featuring 1.8B and 7B...

articles.title: HCLSoftware to acquire Jaspersoft for reported $240M
articles.description: HCLSoftware Inc. plans to acquire Jaspersoft Inc., a provider of business intelligence software, in an all-cash deal reportedly valued at $240 million. The company announced the transaction on Monday. In conjunction, HCLSoftware disclosed that it’s buying Wobby, an early-stage startup with an artificial intelligence tool for querying data warehouses. The transaction is reportedly worth $5.3 […] The post HCLSoftware to acquire Jaspersoft for reported $240M appeared first on SiliconANGLE.

articles.title: Beyond SEO: How AI engine optimization is changing the equation in online visibility
articles.description: The search engine optimization discipline that has guided web marketing efforts for more than two decades is now being disrupted by generative artificial intelligence systems that deliver direct answers rather than lists of links. articles.title: DagsHub now supports MLflow 3.x
articles.description: We’ve shipped support for MLflow 3.x on DagsHub, so you can upgrade your MLflow client and keep using the same hosted tracking server that lives inside every DagsHub repo. No self-hosting, no extra infra, no “where did my artifacts go?” moments.
articles.author: Dean Pleban
articles.content: We’ve shipped support for MLflow 3.x on DagsHub, so you can upgrade your MLflow client and keep using the same hosted tracking server that lives inside every DagsHub repo. No self-hosting, no extra infra, no “where did my artifacts go?” moments.

articles.title: NVIDIA Expands Global DRIVE Hyperion Ecosystem to Accelerate the Road to Full Autonomy
articles.description: At the CES trade show running this week in Las Vegas, NVIDIA announced that the global DRIVE Hyperion ecosystem is expanding to include tier 1 suppliers, automotive integrators and sensor partners, including Aeva, AUMOVIO, Astemo, Arbe, Bosch, Hesai, Magna, Omnivision, Quanta, Sony and ZF Group. This builds on collaborations unveiled at NVIDIA GTC Washington, D.C., Read Article
